Posted By: Kryptnyt (10/6/2011 11:25:21 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
No more [Vines of Vastwood](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vines of Vastwood), [Primal Bellow](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Primal Bellow), [Giant Growth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Giant Growth) and [Groundswell](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Groundswell) for you, green mage. The golden age of creature pumping is over. No longer will you be able to have access to THREE great pumping spells. Now you're left with lame [Titanic Growth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Titanic Growth), [Mutagenic Growth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mutagenic Growth) that's only really useful in fast infect, watered down [Ranger's Guile](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ranger's Guile)... and this unplayable monstrosity.  
  
2/5
posts.html:
